English: At the start of the turn, recover Healing Gauge.
Chinese: 回合开始时，恢复体力极限

English: Whenever a skill is drawn, grant it Swiftness.
Chinese: 每当抽取技能时，使其获得迅速。

English: Increases Attack by an amount equal to your Evasion Rate.
Chinese: 增加的攻击力数值等同于你的闪避率

English: Whenever you evade, unleash Silver Eye Burst on the attacking enemy.
Chinese: 每当你闪避，对攻击你的敌人释放银眼爆发

English: Your attack skills cost 2 less Mana and have Swiftness, ignore Taunt, Follow-up attack, and guaranteed Critical.
Chinese: 你的攻击技能费用减少2点并具有迅速、无视嘲讽、追踪和必定暴击。

English: Your attack skills cost 2 less Mana and have Swiftness, ignore Taunt, Follow-up attack, and guaranteed Critical.
Chinese: 你的攻击技能费用减少2点并具有迅速、无视嘲讽、追踪和必定暴击。

English: When 5 stacks are reached, remove Care and trigger Bloom.
Chinese: 到达5层时移除呵护并绽放

English: Cannot act. Automatically removed at the start of the turn.
Chinese: 无法行动。回合开始时自动解除

English:
Speed +1.
Once per turn, after using two non-Swiftness skills in a single turn, grant Swiftness to a random non-Swiftness skill in your hand.
Chinese:
速度+1。
每回合一次，在你一个回合内使用两次非迅速技能后，使手牌中随机一个非迅速技能获得迅速。

English: Ruby Rose, leader of Team RWBY, wields the unique weapon "Crescent Rose" and utilizes the Semblance "Petal Burst".
Chinese: Ruby Rose，RWBY队的队长，使用独特的专属武器“新月玫瑰”，能使用名为“花瓣冲刺”的Semblance

English: I should really think about what to do next.

At the start of the turn, randomly change the Swiftness attribute of one of your skills in hand.
<color=#919191>"The blade's direction is also where the muzzle points—don't get it backwards."</color>
Chinese:
每回合开始时，随机改变手中自己一个技能的迅速属性
<color=#919191>刀锋的方向也是枪口所在，可千万不能搞反</color>

English: Remove Swiftness from Swift skills in hand and delay the target's action count by the number of Swiftness removed.
Chinese: 手中的迅速技能失去迅速，使目标延迟等同于失去迅速数量的行动倒计时

English: Gain 10% Evasion for each Swiftness skill in hand.
Chinese: 手中每有一个迅速技能，获得10%闪避。

English: Gain 10% Evasion for each Swiftness skill in hand.
Chinese: 手中每有一个迅速技能，获得10%闪避。

English: Recast for each non-Swiftness skill in hand.
Chinese: 手中每有一个非迅速技能，便重复释放一次

English:
Discard all Scythe's Wrath in hand and draw equal number of skills. 
Recast for each non-Swiftness skill in hand.
Chinese: 弃掉手中的镰之怒，抽取等量的技能。手中每有一个非迅速技能，便重复释放一次攻击

English: Recast for each non-Swiftness skill in hand.
Chinese: 手中每有一个非迅速技能，便重复释放一次

English:
Discard all Close-Quarters Snipe in hand and draw equal number of skills. 
Recast for each Swiftness skill in hand.
Chinese: 弃掉手中的近身狙击，抽取等量的技能。手中每有一个迅速技能，便重复释放一次攻击。

English:
Invert the Swiftness attribute of skills in hand. 
Remove all Overload from the party.
Chinese: 反转手中技能的迅速属性，解除全队过载。

English:
Deals additional damage equal to half of Attack (&a). 
Can be reused. 
This turn, the extra damage increases with each use (Remaining uses: &b!).
Chinese: 追加造成攻击力一半(&a)的伤害。可重复使用。在本回合中，额外伤害随使用次数提升(还能使用&b次！)

English:
Can be reused this turn. 
Invert the target skill's Swiftness and grant its owner 5% Evasion. 
At 5 stacks, their attack skills cost 2 less Mana and gain Swiftness, ignore Taunt, Follow-up attack, and guaranteed Critical.
Chinese: 在本回合可以重复使用。转变目标技能的迅速，目标技能拥有者获得5%闪避率。当叠加到5层时，其攻击技能费用减少2点并具有迅速、无视嘲讽、追踪和必定暴击。

English:
When played from hand: If this skill has Swiftness, inflict "Recklessness" on the target. 
Otherwise, remove all buffs from self and gain "Recklessness".
Chinese: 从手牌中使用时，如果该技能具有迅速，使目标获得“鲁莽”，否则，去除自身所有buff，获得“鲁莽”。

English:
Cost reduced based on the owner's Overload count. 
Not Overloaded: After use, gain a 0-cost copy that guarantees Critical. 
Overloaded: Remove all Overload from owner and draw skills equal to stack count. 
Current Overload: &a
Chinese: 根据技能拥有者过载数减费。未过载：释放后获得一个0费的复制，复制的技能必定暴击。已过载：消除拥有者所有过载，抽取等同于层数的技能。当前过载数量：&a

English: If this skill has Swiftness when played, attack all enemies simultaneously.
Chinese: 出手时如果具有迅速，同时攻击所有敌人。

English: Cost reduced by Speed. Deal additional (&a) damage if any enemy has Standby count 9+.
Chinese: 根据速度减少等量的费用。如果有行动9+的敌人，额外造成(&a)的伤害。

English: Prioritize drawing two skills with different Swiftness attributes and swap their Swiftness.
Chinese: 优先抽两个不同迅速的技能，交换它们的迅速。

English: Grant Swiftness to a non-Swiftness skill.
Chinese: 使一个非迅速技能获得迅速。
